comments.body: Could we put this test to `AbstractKeyValueStoreTest` so that all types of kv stores will test it? Ditto below.

`RocksDBStoreTest` does not extend `AbstractKeyValueStoreTest`, so added the method to `AbstractKeyValueStoreTest`.  Maybe a follow up PR to update `RocksDBStoreTest`?

EDIT: `putIfAbsent` also in parent class, removing
